name: Killer
description: You can only kill civilians who are alone in a block.

name: Cutthroat
description: You cannot murder in the four (4) central blocks of the city.

name: Maniac
description: All victims must be of the same sex.

name: Vigilante
description: You cannot murder anyone in the eight (8) blocks surrounding the Detective marker.

name: Terrorist
description: All victims must be from different social groups

name: Cultist
description: The first victim has to be of a different social group than the Person of Interest. Each victim has to be from a different social group than the last. Has to murder the Person of Interest.

name: Robber
description: You cannot murder anyone in any block adjacent to the last crime scene.

name: Cannibal
description: There have to be civilians of all three different builds among the victims

name: Radical
description: At least 3 victims have to be from the same social group.

name: Psychopath
description: All victims can be of no more than two different ages.

name: Spy
description: All victims have to be murdered in blocks with buildings.
